channel.title: I need help removing server
channel.description: i'm wanting to remove my server from the server status checker because people try to connect to the server without using my server client. normally this wouldn't be a problem but my client is the only one that works with the server. Any ideas on how i can fix one of these 2 problems?

item.title: I need help removing server
item.dc:creator: @ZangetsuVampiro ZangetsuVampiro
item.description:
@ZangetsuVampiro wrote:

well i want other people to be able to play but without my client they can’t connect.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help removing server
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Iirc, there was a tutorial somewhere on only making your client connect to your server in the first place. Any other clients will have their connection denied.

Read full topic
